top_articles.title: Adobe Patches Critical Apache Tika Bug in ColdFusion
top_articles.summary: Adobe has released patches for 25 vulnerabilities across its products, including a critical Apache Tika flaw in ColdFusion.

top_articles.title: Microsoft Patches Exploited Windows Zero-Day, 111 Other Vulnerabilities
top_articles.summary: Two vulnerabilities patched this month by Microsoft were disclosed publicly before fixes were released.

top_articles.title: 5 Critical Microsoft 365 Security Settings You Could Be Missing
